name: deadlock dungeon
description:
The boss is too strong to defeat by force, but it behaves in a predictable way. You must place the spearmen so the boss is locked into an endless loop.

The spearmen have long spears and can't attack if the boss comes too close. They'll hit the boss when it's exactly two tiles away.

3rd party assets

  • Beholder (boss) by Captain LowPoly licensed under CC-BY-4.0
  • Knight Character by Inuciian licensed under CC-BY-4.0
  • Spear by Artbake Graphics licensed under CC-BY-4.0
  • Font: Quicksand by Andrew Paglinawan
